feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(history): properly decode activity data by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1083

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.14.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: high performance sqlite by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1007
  • fix: make all fails because of noctx linter by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1087
  • refactor(integrations): tweaks across new-style integrations by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1084
  • fixes after event strucure change by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1088
  • fix: parse session created_at from top struct instead of base by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1086
  • fix(linear): remove mistaken tip in internal connection UI by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1089

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.14.2...v0.14.3

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.14.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • prevent icc through host on linux by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1092
  • fix(python): Don't patch module level calls by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1075
  • bug(python): Guard against panic in goroutine that crashes the server. by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1091
  • feat: set user to non root in user containers for security by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1098
  • fix: skip flakey python tests by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1099
  • refactor(google drive): differentiate between new connection and existing for watch renewal by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1094
  • feat(slack,github): improve handling of event signatures by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1100
  • feat(session-test): test that sessions are invoking specific actions by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1096
  • chore: update web UI version by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1090
  • fix(python): Support top level handler marked as activity by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1050
  • fix(session-tests): actually retry temporal dev server start in session_tests by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1102
  • chore(slack): migrate old connections by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1093
  • chore(integrations): cosmetic tweaks in auth types by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.14.3...v0.14.4

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.14.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(integrations): validate before saving api key in chatgpt by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1105
  • feat: add session_id to parameters when starting a session by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1107
  • refactor(CI): improve build time & isolation by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1108
  • fix: broken python test in main by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1112
  • chore: remove no longer needed integration funcs by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1109
  • refactor(CI): split OPA and Stalark by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1110
  • refactor(CI): session tests by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1111
  • feat: Add soft delete for org and block org deletion if it has associated projects by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1078
  • bug(python): Fix "start" in another module. by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/818
  • refactor(CI): explicit step for each DB type in DB tests by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1113
  • refactor(CI): bring back "go mod download" by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1114
  • refactor(CI): delete obsolete cmd & deterministic test names by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1115

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.14.4...v0.14.5

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(python): Catch code load errors and send to session log by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1117
  • bug(python): Catch BaseException instead of Exception by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1124
  • refactor(CI): minor cosmetic facelift for remaining workflows by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1121
  • refactor(CI): Docker images by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1120
  • fix: dispatch Jira events based on domain + webhook id by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1101
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v4 from 4.0.4 to 4.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1128
  • refactor(CI): path-based triggers for OPA by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1119
  • feat(pythonrt): Event type by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1122
  • fix(CI): obsolete bits in system tests by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1127
  • fix: connstatus false positive by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1118
  • fix(python): Don't call ak_functions in activity. by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1136
  • fix(ENG-2033): allow to reset filter by setting it to . by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1130
  • feat(python): allow to inhibit activities using a decorator by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1135
  • fix(python): Don't use goroutines in message pump by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1137
  • feat(python): autokitteh module functions should not run in an activity by default by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1132
  • BUG-REPRO: python subscribe is stuck by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1129
  • refactor: kill almost all modules and syscalls by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1123
  • feat: Delete events when soft deleting project by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1125
  • fix(projects): Export all variables by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1126
  • chore(python): Install PyGitHub from PyPI & more by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1142
  • chore(python): Python runner depends on Python SDK 0.4 by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1145
  • chore(python): Bump Python SDK to 0.4.0 by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1141
  • chore(python): Test that runner depends on right SDK version by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1146
  • fix(python): Dedent bug when traversing AST by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1144
  • feat(signals): support temporal signals in sessions by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1133
  • fix: index event org for better lists by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1131

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.14.5...v0.15.0
